testCases.name: 1) Normal - both going to bed slightly different times - initiation by bed switches
2) Normal - both going to bed slightly different times - 2nd user uses room switch as 1st user is asleep
3) Normal - timed both going to bed after timer has lit the bedroom - simultaneous move to initial-reading-in-bed
4) Normal - both going to bed at slightly different times - 1st initiates by movement, then bed switch, 2nd using room switch
5) Same as TC4 but with low-light happening before pre-wake-up call
6) Same as TC4 but with low-light happening during awake-in-bed state
7) Same as TC4 but with low-light happening during waking-up-in-bed state
8) Same as TC3 - timed both going to bed after timer has lit the bedroom - wait for timeout
9) Use bed-switch to ovveride main light during the day time
